name: Defenders of Iduna
description:
Currently on BETA v 0.3.0 - By donating for the beta you help me to convince my wife to let me spend more time working on the game. Also, your feedback will be fundamental for the game's improvement. I will be constantly updating the versions as they come!
-

What is this game about?
Defenders of Iduna is a real-time strategy game where you control your units in battles against waves of enemies. It is the type of game that the more you play better you become at it.

The Gameplay
Use only the mouse to perform all of the game's actions. Click and drag to select your units and command them through the battlefield. Maps change every time you start a new game. Between the various types of maps you will find mud areas, swamps, rainy forests, misty graveyards, lava pits - all with their own characteristics. You will also gain experience and unlock spells to help you through the journey.

What's currently on this version?
- fully playable campaign mode;
- story scenes are not included;
- all 3 initial factions unlocked;
- choose between english or portuguese languages;
- three levels of difficulty;

What is currently on development?
- story elements;
- two new modes;
- new playable factions;

> PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS YOU MAY FIND <
